column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/380102Malacca Umno politician to be charged with corruption Tuesday23 April 2017An Umno politician close to the Malacca state administration is expected to be charged with corruption on Tuesday, a Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission source confirms.The MACC last November seized more than RM150 million in cash, vehicles, assets and documents from the politician in its investigations into money laundering.This comes after a state executive council member in neighbouring Johor, Abd Latif Bandi, resigned after he was charged with corruption last week...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
